languages.text: "И что же, ты предлагаешь обречь живое существо на вечные страдания, оставив его гнить в лаборатории гемункула в подобной форме? Не слишком ли жестоко даже для мон-кай? Нет. Лучше я собственноручно избавлю несчастную душу от страданий". {n}Ирлиэт достает из поясной сумки камень душ — такой же, как у нее на шее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И что же, ты предлагаешь обречь живое существо на вечные страдания, оставив его гнить в лаборатории гемункула в подобной форме? Не слишком ли жестоко даже для мон-кай? Нет. Лучше я собственноручно избавлю несчаствую душу от страданий". {n}Ирлиэт достает из поясной сумки камень душ — такой же, как у нее на шее.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И что же, ты предлагаешь обречь живое существо на вечные страдания, оставив его гнить в лаборатории гемункула в подобной форме? Не слишком ли жестоко даже для мон-кай? Нет. Лучше я собственноручно избавлю несчастную душу от страданий". {n}Ирлиэт достает из поясной сумки камень душ — такой же, как у нее на шее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculos's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}Yrliet takes a spirit stone out of her waist bag, identical to the stone she is wearing around her neck.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}Yrliet takes a spirit stone out of her waist bag, identical to the stone she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Sugieres, pues, que abandonemos a un ser vivo a toda una eternidad de sufrimiento? ¿Que la dejemos pudriéndose en el laboratorio del hemónculo, prisionera de esta forma? Semejante crueldad me parece excesiva incluso para {mf|un|una} mon-keigh. No. Prefiero poner fin yo misma al sufrimiento de su pobre alma». {n}Yrliet introduce la mano en la bolsa que lleva al cinto y extrae una joya espiritual idéntica a la que lleva colgada del cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Sugieres, pues, que abandonemos a un ser vivo a toda una eternidad de sufrimiento? ¿Que la dejemos pudriéndose en el laboratorio del hemónculo, prisionera de esta forma? Semejante crueldad me parece excesiva incluso para {mf|un|una} mon-keigh. No. Prefiero poner fin yo misma al sufrimiento de su pobre alma». {n}Yrliet introduce la mano en la bolsa que lleva al cinto y extrae una joya espiritual idéntica a la que lleva colgada del cuello.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「では、あなたは生者を永遠の苦しみへ突き落とせというのか？こんな姿で閉じ込められたまま、ハモンキュラスの研究室で朽ち果てていくのを見過ごせというのか？たとえモン＝ケイでも、その残酷さは度を越しているぞ。それはいけない。我はむしろ、この哀れな魂の苦しみを自分の手で終わらせてやりたいのだ」。{n}ユリエットはベルトの袋から、首にかけているものと同じ魂縛石を取り出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、あなたは生者を永遠の苦しみへ突き落とせというのか？こんな姿で閉じ込められたまま、ハモンキュラスの研究室で朽ち果てていくのを見過ごせというのか？たとえモン＝ケイでも、その残酷さは度を越しているぞ。それはいけない。我はむしろ、この哀れな魂の苦しみを自分の手で終わらせてやりたいのだ」。{n}ユリエットはベルトの袋から、首にかけているものと同じ魂縛石を取り出した。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你是在建议我们抛弃这个活生生的人，任由她遭受永无止境的痛苦吗？难道我们真的要让它像这样被囚禁在血伶人的实验室里，就此腐烂吗？哪怕是对猴子而言，这样的处境也实在是太残忍了。不行，我宁愿亲自结束这个可怜灵魂的痛苦。”{n}伊莉耶特从腰带上的袋子里取出了一块灵魂石，看起来和她脖子上戴的那块一模一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你是在建议我们抛弃这个活生生的人，任由她遭受永无止境的痛苦吗？难道我们真的要让它像这样被囚禁在血伶人的实验室里，就此腐烂吗？哪怕是对猴子而言，这样的处境也实在是太残忍了。不行，我宁愿亲自结束这个可怜灵魂的痛苦。”{n}伊莉耶特从腰带上的袋子里取出了一块灵魂石，看起来和她脖子上戴的那块一模一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Êtes-vous en train de suggérer que nous abandonnions un être vivant à une éternité de souffrance ? Que nous le laissions pourrir dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule, emprisonné sous cette forme ? Même pour {mf|un|une} mon-keigh, une telle cruauté semble excessive. Non. Je préfère encore mettre fin aux souffrances de cette pauvre âme moi-même. » {n}Yrliet détache de la sacoche accrochée à sa ceinture une pierre-esprit similaire à celle qu'elle porte autour de son cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Êtes-vous en train de suggérer que nous abandonnions un être vivant à une éternité de souffrance ? Que nous le laissions pourrir dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule, emprisonné sous cette forme ? Même pour {mf|un|une} mon-keigh, une telle cruauté semble excessive. Non. Je préfère encore mettre fin aux souffrances de cette pauvre âme moi-même. » {n}Yrliet détache de la sacoche accrochée à sa ceinture une pierre-esprit similaire à celle qu'elle porte autour de son cou.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wollt also zulassen, dass ein Lebewesen bis in alle Ewigkeit leiden muss? Dass wir es im Labor des Haemonculus verrotten lassen, gefangen in dieser Form? Selbst für {mf|einen|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey handelt Ihr extrem grausam. Nein. Dann werde ich das Leiden dieser armen Seele lieber selbst beenden." {n}Aus ihrer Gürteltasche holt Yrliet einen Seelenstein, der mit dem um ihren Hals identisch ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt also zulassen, dass ein Lebewesen bis in alle Ewigkeit leiden muss? Dass wir es im Labor des Haemonculus verrotten lassen, gefangen in dieser Form? Selbst für {mf|einen|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey handelt Ihr extrem grausam. Nein. Dann werde ich das Leiden dieser armen Seele lieber selbst beenden." {n}Aus ihrer Gürteltasche holt Yrliet einen Seelenstein, der mit dem um ihren Hals identisch ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yani canlı bir varlığı ebedî eziyete teslim etmemizi mi öneriyorsun? Onu Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarında, bu biçimde hapsedilmiş hâlde çürümeye mi bırakalım? Bir mon-keigh için bile bu gaddarlık haddinden fazla gibi. Hayır. Biçare ruhun eziyetine kendim son vermeyi yeğlerim." {n}Yrliet, kemerindeki keseden, boynuna taktığının özdeşi olan bir ruh taşı çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting, then, that we abandon a living being to an eternity of suffering? That we leave it to rot in the Haemonculus's laboratory, imprisoned in this form? Even for a mon-keigh, the cruelty seems excessive. No. I would rather end the poor soul's suffering myself." {n}From the bag at her belt, Yrliet takes out a spirit stone identical to the one she is wearing around her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Peki o hâlde yaşayan bir varlığı ebedî eziyete teslim etmeyi mi öneriyorsun? Onu Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarında, bu biçimde hapsedilmiş hâlde çürümeye mi bırakalım? Bir mon-keigh için bile bu gaddarlık haddinden fazla gibi. Hayır. Biçare ruhun eziyetine kendim son vermeyi yeğlerim." {n}Yrliet, kemerindeki keseden boynuna taktığının özdeşi olan bir ruh taşı çıkarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
